name: Force Rotation
desc: This structure constantly rotates around its axis.

name: Pulse Core
desc:
The lack of safety protocols increases the ship's top speed in combat by %s/%s/%s/%s and allows the zero-flux engine boost to take always effect. The flux dissipation rate, including that of additional vents, is increased by a factor of %s.
Prevents the use of active venting, and slightly reduces weapon ranges past %s units and %s hard flux dissipation while shields are active
This ship is %s automated, and does not require any human crew. The requirement of the crew for these ship are very low.
Safety Overrides can not be installed these ships.

name: Pulse Core Deviant
desc:
Reduces the amount of soft flux raised shields generate per second by %s, %s hard flux dissipation while shields are active.
Extends the range of ballistic and energy weapons by %s unit.
The performance of this core increase the explosion radius and damage by %s/%s/%s/%s, depending on hull size.
